Keywords: Armor , Avengers , Celebrity , Scientist , Stark Industries , Warrior
Real Name: Tony Stark
Special Powers
I'VE WORKED WITH SCRAPS BEFORE: At the beginning of the game, you may generate up to 3 standard objects anywhere on the map at least 5 squares from each other. // When Sakaarian Iron Man picks up a standard object, you may instead place it on his card if less than two objects are on his card. // Sakaarian Iron Man modifies his combat values by +1 for each standard object on his card and, at the beginning of your turn, may choose one standard speed or attack power for each object on his card to use until your next turn. // When Sakaarian Iron Man would be dealt damage from an opponent's attack, you may remove a standard object from his card to take 1 unavoidable damage instead.
THE SMARTEST MAN ON ANY PLANET: Outwit, Perplex.

Comments
June 21, 2022
Maxphyte
You can only normally pick up one object per move. So in your scenario, you would not be able to pick up two objects. In order to pick up two objects on the same turn, you would need to do two different instances of movement. If Iron Man hypothetically had Sidestep, you could pick up an object with a normal MOVE action and then pick up a second object after with the use of Sidestep.
June 20, 2022
Angel1995
i have a question about picks up an object. when you make a move action in the same turn, can you pick up two objects, considering that saakarian puts them on his card. example i move 5 squares and pick up and object that goes on the card of saakarian then i move 5 more squares and pick up the other object. it is legal to do this or you can pick up an object for turn?
